articles.description: If you are ICICI Bank customer then make a note of the revised charges effective from August 1. The bank has revised cash transactions limits, ATM Interchange and cheque book charges for its domestic savings account holders.

articles.description: Johnson & Johnson had sought approval in April to conduct a bridging clinical study of its Janssen Covid-19 vaccine candidate in India.
